CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISBLANK( OtherPhone), ISBLANK( LastName ), Is_Default_Last_Name__c, Is_Default_Other_Phone__c ) ,null, SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(OtherPhone, "+", ""), "(", ""), ")", ""), "-", ""), " ",""), ".",""), "/","") & LastName)
CustomField.label: PL 2
